languages.text: Огонь вновь запылал в домнах, станки наполнили воздух визгом, маг-поезда вагонеток вереницами тянутся из цеха в цех. Но в бинарных песнопениях когитаторов слышатся тревожные слухи о зловещих и мерзких следах порчи, что находят в самых глубоких палатах мануфакторума.

traits.locale_text: Огонь вновь запылал в домнах, станки наполнили воздух визгом, маг-поезда вагонеток вереницами тянутся из цеха в цех. Но в бинарных песнопениях когитаторов слышатся тревожные слухи о зловещих и мерзких следах порчи, что находят в самых глубоких палатах мануфакторума.

languages.text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binharic chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.
languages.original_text: Огонь вновь запылал в домнах, станки наполнили воздух визгом, маг-поезда вагонеток вереницами тянутся из цеха в цех. Но в бинарных песнопениях когитаторов слышатся тревожные слухи о зловещих и мерзких следах порчи, что находят в самых глубоких палатах мануфакторума.

traits.locale_text: Blast furnaces are lit once again, machines fill the air with screeches and squeals and wagon trains stretch in lines from one factory to another. But there are worrying rumors about vile and disgusting traces of corruption in the cogitators' binary chants. Evil lurks in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

Blast furnaces are lit once again, machines fill the air with screeches and squeals and wagon trains stretch in lines from one factory to another. But there are worrying rumors about vile and disgusting traces of corruption in the cogitators' binary chants. Evil lurks in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binary chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binary chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binharic chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

languages.text: 高炉被再次点燃，空气中再次充斥着机器尖锐的摩擦声，磁力列车的车厢也再次从一个车间开向了另一个车间。然而，无数沉思者的二进制吟唱声中依然充斥着令人震惊的谎言。邪恶、肮脏的腐化痕迹，依然潜伏在制造工厂的最深处。
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binharic chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: 高炉被再次点燃，空气中再次充斥着机器尖锐的摩擦声，磁力列车的车厢也再次从一个车间开向了另一个车间。然而，无数思考器的二进制吟唱声中依然充斥着令人震惊的谎言。邪恶、肮脏的腐化痕迹，依然潜伏在制造工厂的最深处。

languages.text: Los grandes hornos vuelven a arder, las máquinas llenan el aire de chirridos y crujidos otra vez y magnetotrén tras magnetotrén circula de un taller a otro. Sin embargo, los cánticos binarios de los cogitadores llevan en sus trinos rumores alarmantes sobre los restos de corrupción inmunda que aún acechan en los más recónditos confines del manufactorum.
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binharic chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: Los grandes hornos vuelven a arder, las máquinas llenan el aire de chirridos y crujidos otra vez y magnetotrén tras magnetotrén circula de un taller a otro. Sin embargo, los cánticos binarios de los cogitadores llevan en sus trinos rumores alarmantes sobre los restos de corrupción inmunda que aún acechan en los más recónditos confines del manufactorum.

languages.text: Die Hochöfen werden wieder entfacht, Maschinen erfüllen die Luft wieder mit Kreischen und Quietschen, und Waggons ziehen in langen Reihen von einer Werkstatt zur nächsten. Doch die binhärischen Gesänge der Cogitatoren verbreiten alarmierende Gerüchte über bösartige und üble Spuren der Korruption, die noch immer in den tiefsten Kammern des Manufactorums lauern.
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binharic chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binharic chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

languages.text: À nouveau, les hauts-fourneaux rugissent, les machines emplissent l'air de leur vacarme, et les trains magnétiques alignent leurs wagons d'un poste de production à l'autre. Cependant, les incantations binhaires des cogitateurs propagent des rumeurs alarmantes sur la survivance d'une corruption aussi malveillante que répugnante dans les salles les plus profondes du manufactorum.
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binharic chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: À nouveau, les hauts-fourneaux rugissent, les machines emplissent l'air de leur vacarme, et les trains magnétiques alignent leurs wagons d'un poste de production à l'autre. Cependant, les incantations binhaires des cogitateurs propagent des rumeurs alarmantes sur la survivance d'une corruption aussi malveillante que répugnante dans les salles les plus profondes du manufactorum.

languages.text: 高炉は再び点火して、機械はまたもやキーキー、ギシギシという音で空気を満たし、ワゴンの磁力列車が作業場から作業場へと列になって伸びる。しかし、考算機の2進数の聖歌は、聖工場の最奥の部屋にまだ潜む腐敗の嫌な痕跡について、警鐘を鳴らしている。
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binharic chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.

traits.locale_text: 高炉は再び点火して、機械はまたもやキーキー、ギシギシという音で空気を満たし、ワゴンの磁力列車が作業場から作業場へと列になって伸びる。しかし、考算機の2進数の聖歌は、聖工場の最奥の部屋にまだ潜む腐敗の嫌な痕跡について、警鐘を鳴らしている。

languages.text: Yüksek fırınlar yeniden yakıldı, makineler bir kez daha havayı tiz seslerle ve cırlamalarla dolduruyor ve manyetik trenlerin vagonları bir atölyeden diğerine sıralar oluşturuyor. Ancak kavramsayarların ikilidil ilahilerinden yozlaşmışlığın kötücül ve kirli izlerinin hâlâ manufaktorumun en derin odalarında kol gezdiğine dair tehlikeli söylentiler yayılıyor.
languages.original_text: The blast furnaces are lit again, machines once more fill the air with screeches and squeals, and mag-trains of wagons stretch in lines from one workshop to the next. But the cogitators' binharic chants carry alarming rumours of malevolent and foul traces of corruption still lurking in the deepest chambers of the manufactorum.
